To Do Chain

A decentralized to-do list on Ethereum

Step 1: Connect your Wallet

Connect your MetaMask wallet to the Ethereum blockchain to access ToDoChain.

Step 2: Add Tasks

Safely and confidentially add your tasks to the Ethereum blockchain.

Step 3: Manage your Tasks

Browse your previous tasks or delete them, securely manage your tasks with confidence.

Built by Alexandre BOURDOIS | To Do List on Ethereum | 2024
